description: This file describe combats rules, with hits rules and some leveling info.

chance.name: combat.hit_chance
chance.description: Calculates the chance to hit based on attacker's attack ability and defender's defense ability.

hit.name: combat.is_hit
hit.description: Determines if an attack hits based on a random roll against the hit chance.

damages.name: combat.hit_damages
damages.description: Calculates the damage dealt on a successful hit based on attacker's strength, defender's endurance, and any item bonuses.
